1.question: Get the value of an attribute for the first element in the set of matched elements or set one or more attributes for every matched element.

2.question: Get the value of a property(свойство) for the first element in the set of matched elements or set one or more properties(свойства) for every matched element.

3.question: Remove an attribute from each element in the set of matched elements.

4.question: Remove a property(свойство) for the set of matched elements.

5.question: Get the current value(значение) of the first element in the set of matched elements or set the value(значение) of every matched element.
